text: The 2018 Czech Athletics Championships () was the 26th edition of the national outdoor track and field championships for the Czech Republic. It was held on 28 and 29 July at the Municipal Stadium Sletiště in Kladno. The host club for the competition was AC Tepo Kladno. The same venue is used for the annual TNT – Fortuna Meeting combined events meeting.Osoba, Michal (2017-06-18). Cachova and Bourrada victorious at TNT Express meeting in Kladno . IAAF. Retrieved 2019-07-24. Several events were held separately from the main track and field competition. The 10,000 metres took place in Brno on 28 April,Mistrovství ČR mužů, žen, juniorů a juniorek v běhu na 10000 m. atletika.cz Retrieved 2019-07-24. the marathon championships were held within the annual Prague Marathon on 6 May,MISTROVSTVÍ ČR V MARATONU MUŽŮ A ŽEN. atletika.cz. Retrieved 2019-07-24. and the 20 kilometres race walk championships were held within the annual Poděbrady Race Walking meet in Poděbrady on 7 April.
